PBGZIP
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PBGZIP installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PBGZIP, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PBGZIP/20160804-GCC-11.2.0
```
